member.name: CD3D11_BOX.CD3D11_BOX
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with a CD3D11_BOX structure.
member.param: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with a D3D11_BOX structure.

member.name: CD3D11_BOX.CD3D11_BOX
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_BOX structure that is initialized with the dimensions of a box.
member.param: The x-coordinate of the left hand side of the box.
The y-coordinate of the top of the box.
The z-coordinate of the front of the box.
The x-coordinate of the right hand side of the box.
The y-coordinate of the bottom of the box.
The y-coordinate of the back of the box.

member.name: CD3D11_BOX.CD3D11_BOX
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_BOX structure.

member.name: CD3D11_BOX
member.summary: Represents a box and provides convenience methods for creating boxes.
